text: Ikiavɨra Itir God, Joap amizir arazir kurar kaba ikarvagh, ivezir kuram a danɨngam. Joap Nerɨn otarim Apner ko Jeterɨn otarim Amasa, a mɨdorozir sabamɨn puram aning mɨsoghezɨ aning areme. Aning an mɨn gumazir kuramning puvatɨ. Apner, a Israelian mɨdorozir gumazibar dapanim, ezɨ Amasa, a Judabar mɨdorozir gumazibar dapanim. Nan afeziam Devit fozir puvatɨzɨ, Joap arazir kam gami.
